column1: Uthal (Urdu: اوتھل‎) is a city of Lasbela District in the Balochistan province of  Pakistan. Uthal is headquarters of Uthal Tehsil an administrative subdivision of the district.
The Bela population consists principally of Baloch
column2: followed by Sindhis. The population is predominantly Muslim.
Water and Marine Science is located in Uthal.
